attributes.action: Stop sales of fireworks to the public.
attributes.additional_details: Stopping general public sales of fireworks will not only save our pets and our farm stock. This will help the environment from debris which is caused from used fireworks.
attributes.background: I want the sales of fireworks to the general public Banned to help save the suffering and death of family pets and farm animals due to being scared so much they shake furiously panting for breath and some die. End the suffering now

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557780

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
